article_title: Hospitals, including Carolinas HealthCare, using consumer purchase data for information on patient health
article_text: Hospitals, including Carolinas HealthCare System, are starting to use detailed consumer data to create profiles on current and potential patients to identify those most likely to get sick, so the hospitals can intervene before they do.
